Summary: Okay but no WOW factor for the taste buds
text:
I thought this drink had a well balanced flavor. I preferred it over the Caffe blend that I had previously tried. I drank it cold and it was enjoyable. No fireworks of the taste buds or immediate desire for more. But, it tasted okay.

Final impression based on my one-can taste test: Just okay. I may or may not buy one if I was in the mood for a cold coffee drink at a convenience or drug store.
